original_text:
And the Lord said to Ahijah, “Behold, the wife of Jeroboam is coming to inquire of you concerning her son, for he is sick. Thus and thus shall you say to her.”
When she came, she pretended to be another woman.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아히야에게 이르시되 여로보암의 아내가 자기 아들이 병 들었으므로 네게 물으러 오나니 너는 이러이러하게 대답하라 그가 들어올 때에 다른 사람인 체함이니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Ahijah
the wife of Jeroboam is coming to inquire of you
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암의 아내가 당신에게 물으려고 오고 있으니

sentences.original_text: Thus and thus shall you say to her
she pretended to be another woman
